An MBA student blending data, education, and technology.

I‚Äôm an MBA student with a strong foundation in STEM and over four years of international teaching experience. I‚Äôm deeply interested in data analysis, educational innovation, and digital transformation, and I‚Äôm actively exploring roles where I can combine technical, teaching, and business knowledge to solve meaningful problems. # üéì Education **Master of Business Administration** University Canada West | *2024 ‚Äì Present* **Master of Science (Zoology)** Punjabi University, Patiala, India | *2018 ‚Äì 2020* **Bachelor of Science (Bioinformatics)** Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar, India | *2015 ‚Äì 2018* # üíº Experience **Assistant Centre Director** Mathnasium of West Vancouver | *May 2024 ‚Äì Present* - Manage day-to-day centre operations and lead the instructional team - Provide high-quality customer support and sales consultation to families - Support the Centre Director in planning, scheduling, and performance tracking - Drive collaboration and team culture to ensure student success **Programming & Math Instructor** WhiteHat Jr. | *Aug 2020 ‚Äì Feb 2024* - Delivered 1:1 and small group programming lessons to students globally (Grades 4‚Äì10) - Taught real-world projects involving games, websites, apps, data science, VR/AR, and cybersecurity - Conducted interactive and story-based math sessions for Grades 7‚Äì8 - Taught students from diverse regions including the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and more # üß† Skills - **Technical**: Python, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, React Native, jQuery, AFRAME - **Education-Focused**: Curriculum delivery, instructional design, student engagement - **Business**: Leadership, operations, sales, team management, CRM - **Languages**: English (Fluent) # üì´ Contact üìç Vancouver, BC üìû +1 (236) 330‚Äë7967 üìß kirti.gupta1219@gmail.com üîó [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kirti-3988281a5/)
